'''"Courier's Timely Dispatch"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Courier's Timely Dispatch" is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in {{Location|Coatepec Mountain}} after lighting up three [[Pyro Monument]]s.
